column4: hello all, does anyone know howI add mp3 to SoundConverter  ?
Ubuntu had flac & wav  option, but mp3. Does anyone know how to add mp3 to SoundConverter  ?
does anyone know how to add mp3 to SoundConverter  ?
have you added medibuntu repos and updated?
after running your suggestion "apt-get install gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly-multiverse" , then relaunch SondConverter, it has the same old version, does it need to reboot ?
let me check if mp3 option is included ?
yee haa...it has the mp3 option included. THANKS SO MUCH mdg!!!!
would you please explain what is "  gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly-multiverse " ?
is the plugin written to help handle mp3 files
how about "ACC" option in SoundCoverter still grayed out, do you know how to enable it or add in such as MP3 earlier ?
not seeing anything for AAC - Apple is figley to get to play nice
